name: Snake II - Nokia tribute
description:
A clone of the old Snake II for Nokia phones.

Features:

  • Saved highscore between playsessions
  • 1 Blank level (Sandbox)
  • 3 Default levels
  • Can open and convert .PNG images to levels (2 example custom levels)
  • Build-in Level Editor

Even though everything looks and sounds alot like the original game, i have made all the assets my self.
